definition: to leave a country or region/outbound (tourism)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: They hoped to obtain exit visas here and escaped to the New World At first, Rick can't forgive that Ilsa's gone back on[3] her word.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望能在这里得到出境证后逃离到美洲新大陆去。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the techniques and methods of rodents killing in in-and-out small - scale ships.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨进出境小型船舶灭鼠的技术和方法。

sentences.english: The exit goods for processing shall be shipped back to China within the time limit as prescribed by the customs.
sentences.chinese: 出境加工货物应当在海关规定的期限内复运进境。

sentences.english: He was declared persona non grata and thrown out of the country.
sentences.chinese: 他被这个国家宣布为不受欢迎的人并被驱逐出境。

sentences.english: Loading and unloading inbound and outbound means of transport may be subject to supervision and control of the Customs.
sentences.chinese: 海关可以对进出境运输工具装卸货物实施监装监卸。

sentences.english: Heroin has been smuggled out by sea.
sentences.chinese: 海洛因已从海上偷运出境。

sentences.english: Please fill in the arrival and departure cards.
sentences.chinese: 请填写入境卡和出境卡。

sentences.english: The leftist leader already had expelled the U.S. ambassador six months earlier.
sentences.chinese: 早在六个月前左派领导人已经把美国大使驱逐出境。

sentences.english: Are there duty-free shop in the immigration gate?
sentences.chinese: 出境口有没有免税商店？

sentences.english: Can I get a Half year & Multi-entry Business (F) visa inside of China?
sentences.chinese: 本人能办到在华半年内屡次贸易入出境有效签证么？

sentences.english: The Customs valuation of inward and outward articles shall be determined by the Customs according to law.
sentences.chinese: 进出境物品的完税价格，由海关依法确定。

sentences.english: The authorities deported her for illegal entry.
sentences.chinese: 当局以她非法入境为由将她驱逐出境。

sentences.english: I like the "flap-flap" sound made by the mechanical departure board.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢机械式的出境看板发出的啪啪声。

sentences.english: S. visa, if been unlawfully present in, or deported from, the United States?
sentences.chinese: 是否曾非法进入美国或曾被美国递解出境？

sentences.english: So if they do complain, they risk being deported.
sentences.chinese: 因此如果她们提出申诉，她们就有被驱逐出境的危险。

sentences.english: Goods sold to outbound or transit passengers by the tax-free shops set up according to the act.
sentences.chinese: 三依法设立之免税商店销售与过境或出境旅客之货物。

definition: land route/to go by surface transport
to pass through a country's territory/transit
to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
illegal immigration/to stowaway (on a ship)/to steal across the international border/to run a blockade
to repatriate (e.g. prisoners of war)/to send back
